content: I am a PhD Candidate in the topic of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI), using insights from the social sciences, philosophy and argumentation theory to enhance explanation quality for Machine Learning (ML).
summary: I am a PhD Candidate in the topic of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI), using insights from the social sciences, philosophy and argumentation theory to enhance explanation quality for Machine Learning (ML).
title: Marcel Robeer

summary: Foil Trees shorten model-agnostic XAI explanations to features relevant in distinguishing one output from a contrasting output.
title: Contrastive Explanations with Local Foil Trees

summary: We further validate Visual Narrator (VN) and incorporate it in the Grimm method, to use VN to easily analyze a whole set of user story requirements.
title: Extracting Conceptual Models from User Stories with Visual Narrator

summary: Visual Narrator is a technique and tool to automatically derive conceptual models from user story requirements.
title: Automated Extraction of Conceptual Models from User Stories via NLP
